reviews.review: Отличная игра, выглядит довольно просто, но чтобы тащить, придётся потратить прилично времени и включать голову. Из минусов - регулярные поборы, хоть и не слишком большие, но всё же.

Good game but..
Why u always nerf killer!!
polecam jesli lubisz zjebac sobie psyche :)
Es muy entretenido u w u

Nur zwei Worte: geiles Spiel. Wenn, ja wenn manchmal die anderen Survivor nicht wären :-) Manchmal braucht man ne hohe Frustationsgrenze. Um nicht zu sagen, da sollte man alle Skillpunkte reinhauen, die man so hat, sonst kann man sich schon mal die Haare raufen als Surv, wenn die anderen Survs den Killer so lange am Haken aufhalten das man nicht abgehängt werden kann. Oder als Killer im Afterchat, wenn man als Camper, Tunneler uvm bezeichnet wird. Manche haben eben das Spielprinzip nicht begriffen :-) Trotdem bin ich nicht umsonst 2000 Stunden dabei, das Game ist und bleibt klasse. Eines der bestdurchdachtesten Killerspiele die ich kenne. 
Ich wünsche euch viel Spaß. Möge der Entitus mit euch sein

Игра хороша, хоть в ней и много токсичности...если ты играешь за мана против токсиков и они приседают перед зарашеной  палетой, кликают фонариком, ломают крюки перед повешанием и снова фонарики и ты чувствуешь себя беспомощным маном против них и после катки ты видишь от них GG но когда ты вешаешь всех или стоит тебе затунелить кого либо то ты конченный еблан, если норм игроки то игра  хорошая и приятная за сурвов и манов
Esse jogo só me gerou alguns traumas e me fez ter genuíno medo do lado assassino de certas pessoas... Nada q alguns anos de terapia não resolvam!

Лучшая соревновательная игра для отдыха. Конечно иногда и раздражает, но куда без этого. С донатом игра становится интереснее и сумма которую нужно потратить невелика, как и стоимость самой игры. Советую.

Игра хорошая, интересная задумка - революционная для того времени. Начинал играть ещё на плойке, когда её раздавали в PS Plus. Но в данный момент баланс в игре уже оставляет желать лучшего, к сожалению...
Игра хорошая (нет). Всем советую к приобретению (снова нет). Если уже купили и играете, то вы поймёте о чём я.

It's great game... you'll hate it! But you'll keep coming back to it, cause you really do love it. Honestly playing this game is like being in a TOXIC relationship, (Only joking slightly). With abundance of players who will just hate on you no matter what you do, (Whither you're on their side or not). Just ignore it or laugh at it as I certainly often do! ;)

If you can get past the hate (And I strongly suggest you do), you'll find a gem of game with considerable line up of unique characters, perks, powers and distinct maps to play on, each having a personality of their own. With only more being added on a consistent basis, you'll be sure not to run out content any time soon.

You don't even haft to buy premium currency to obtain these new characters (However you're in for quit the grand if you don't).

This game may take a bit to master (Or even get a handle on), but the pay off is well worth getting over that higher skill celling you will face at the start, before you begin to master the game and see you're skill set grow exponentially.

Just give it a go for your self and if you main Killer get ready to have the survivors rule book thrown at ya. You TOXIC tunnelling camper you! ;)

The play style in this game is atrocious. The game itself has a couple problems that I can mostly ignore, but the way you can play the killers in this game is just the worst. I have a lot more hours on console but in the probably 300 hours I've played this game, I cannot be more sincere enough when I say that 90% of the games I play as survivor go the same way. Facecamping, proxy camping, or tunneling. There is not nearly enough in this game to prevent those things from happening, and when it does provide, it provides in form of an ENTIRE PERK SLOT rather than just a base mechanic. It is so easy to tunnel or facecamp, and the "punish" you get for it is nearly negligible. Survivors are given perks like decisive strike to counter tunneling, which decisive in itself can be countered if you slug the survivor for long enough, but should also be given without a perk slot being used. Most of my survivor games end in only one or two kills, all due to facecamping and tunneling. Do you guys not realize how boring and unfun that is? Even when I escape 10 times in a row, I still have a bad time playing because everytime I tried to save my teammates, they'd just get put right back on the hook or camped so we couldn't unhook without entire team cooperation. The game itself is a great concept and I think can be genuinely fun for those 10% of killers that don't want to have the most lame play style ever seen in gaming, and almost everybody in that 10% killers win just about everytime I play against them, and I genuinely have fun against them. It's just sad to see how many people love boring brain dead strategies, I could never recommend this game to anybody purely off of the community alone. A great game that's ruined by its players, its such a shame.
Très bon jeu, on s'amuse bien.
